# App Settings Docs

## Accessing Application Settings

- [Accessing Application Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/app-settings/index.md): Learn more about: Accessing application settings (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Create Property Grids for User Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/app-settings/how-to-create-property-grids-for-user-settings.md): Learn more about: How to: Create Property Grids for User Settings in Visual Basic
- [How to: Persist User Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/app-settings/how-to-persist-user-settings.md): Learn more about: How to: Persist User Settings in Visual Basic
- [How to: Change User Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/app-settings/how-to-change-user-settings.md): Learn more about: How to: Change User Settings in Visual Basic
- [How to: Read Application Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/app-settings/how-to-read-application-settings.md): Learn more about: How to: Read Application Settings in Visual Basic
